"Do Not Wait to Be Told Your Duty."--Do not wait to be told your duty. Open your eyes and see who are around you; make yourselves acquainted with the helpless, afflicted, and needy. Hide not yourselves from them and seek not to shut out their needs. Who gives the proofs mentioned in James, of possessing pure 
                                                                           103
religion, untainted with selfishness or corruption?-- Testimonies, vol. 2, p. 29.
